document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

heading.emphasis:
Genus
Neoaulobia Fain, Bochkov and Mironov

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

: 40
. Type-species:

Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000
, by original designation.

Type material.
Holotype female at IRSNB ( 29036 ), paratypes : females at IRSNB , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Aratinga jandaya
( type host) ( Psittaciformes : Psittacidae ), type-locality: BRAZIL (
Fain et al . 2000
).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 137 ), paratypes : females, males, nymphs at ZSM , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Cacatua tenuirostris
( type host) ( Psittaciformes : Cacatuidae ), type-locality: AUSTRALIA , New Holland (
Skoracki 2005 c
).

Type material.
Holotype female at UNAM , paratypes : females at UNAM , ZISP , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Aratinga canicularis
( type host) ( Psittaciformes : Psittacidae ), type-locality: MEXICO , Huacana (
Bochkov & Perez 2002
).

Type material.
Holotype female at UNAM , paratypes : females at UNAM , ZISP , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Amazona finschi
( Psittaciformes : Psittacidae ), type-locality: MEXICO , Sinaloa, Piaxtla (
Bochkov & Perez 2002
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
puylaerti (Skoracki and Dabert, 1999 )
,
Aulobia puylaerti Skoracki and Dabert, 1999 : 523
, figs. 1–7 ;

.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at MRAC , paratypes : females at MRAC , AMU .

psittaculae
Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000

, figs. 36–41 .
Type material.
Holotype female at IRSNB ( 29035 ), paratypes : females at IRSNB , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Psittacula cyanocephala
( type host) ( Psittaciformes : Psittacidae ), type-locality: INDIA (
Fain et al . 2000
).
